column4: hello, i'm trying to install ubuntu 10.10 from a cd on a macbook4,1 following the instructions on https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook4-1/Maverick . The instructions say that to enable AirPort I need to enable an additional driver for BCM4328. But I don't have any additional drivers.
When i went to System -> Administration -> Additional Drivers, it actually tried to access the network to search for them.
do i have to connect wired first to get the drivers?
